DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective compare antidepressant efficacy , safety , tolerability DVS SR versus placebo subject Major Depressive Disorder . Additional objective include test general functional quality-of-life outcome satisfaction therapy report subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Efficacy Safety Desvenlafaxine Tablets Adult Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: A primary diagnosis MDD Depressive symptom least 30 day screen visit . Treatment DVS SR time past . Known hypersensitivity venlafaxine Significant risk suicide base clinical judgment
